RT @PSofficiel: Find the speech of the #President CongressPS of our President, @eliodirupo, live on his Facebook page!
Our proposal to reduce working hours opens up opportunities for thousands of people today who are out of work. # CongrèsPS
Too many working people receive low wages, even if they work full time. # CongressPS # TheValorizedWork
It is to overcome this distressing low income that I have proposed the "generalized social bonus". # CongressPS # TheValorizedWork
The PS intends to reflect on the status and salary of all professions of great social utility. # CongressPS # TheValorizedWork
I urge the federal government to recognize the value of public employment. # CongressPS # TheValorizedWork
For the PS, it is essential that the federal government hires massively + neighborhood police. # CongrèsPS
In our proposals for full employment and well-paid jobs we add a major tax reform. # CongrèsPS
We want to reform the tax system to bring more tax justice and more jobs to our country. # CongressPS # TheValorizedWork
The only party that totally and sincerely supports the people who work is the Socialist Party! # CongressPS # TheValorizedWork
The Gvt Michel will impoverish the future pensioners as never since the end of the Second World War. # CongrèsPS
Solidarity with our elders is not discussed, does not bargain, does not negotiate. # CongrèsPS
I want to strongly repeat our feeling of abomination and condemnation of @FranckenTheo # CongressPS
We will not let Francken degrade human beings, be they Belgian or Sudanese. # CongrèsPS
We will not let the N-VA soil our country and the soul of Belgian citizens. # CongrèsPS
The PS addresses the citizens revolted by injustice to the abandoned capitalist system, the PS represents the alternative!
I invite the right to engage the battle of ideas against us. # CongrèsPS
It will be project against project, leftist activists against defenders of privileges and inequalities. # CongrèsPS
We will show that the PS is alive, and alive. We will show that the PS is standing, and standing. # CongrèsPS
Yes, dear Comrades, the sun will always shine! Long live the work, long live the PS, long live socialism! # CongrèsPS

I only have ONE PAGE on Twitter and ONE PAGE on Facebook. The ones that pretend to be mine are illegal and therefore malicious
The intention, perhaps, is to publish treatises that seem mine, but that contradict my true opinions.
The fake page is not a parody of humor, which is relatively common on Twitter, but an attempt to deceive the reader.
A warning to those who follow me or visit me: there is a fake Twitter page that tries to pretend to be mine.
